title: WannaCry and NotPetya ransomware
extract: WannaCry, Petya, NotPetya: how ransomware hit the big time in 2017. ... But the outbreak wasn't the birth of ransomware, a type of computer crime which sees computers or data hijacked and a fee demanded to give them back to their owners.Dec 30, 2017
extract_html: WannaCry, Petya, NotPetya: how ransomware hit the big time in 2017. ... But the outbreak wasn't the birth of ransomware, a type of computer crime which sees computers or data hijacked and a fee demanded to give them back to their owners.Dec 30, 2017
